title: Valid CORE properties should be saved when creating a CAR MODEL
gherkin:
When the user creates a CAR MODEL "Test Car" with the following valid data
  | key              | value    |
  | name             | Test Car |
  | built_from       | 1988     |
  | built_to         | 1999     |
  | generation       | 1        |
  | internal_code    | F99      |
  | total_production | 222222   |
Then the response should contain the following data
  | key              | value    |
  | name             | Test Car |
  | built_from       | 1988     |
  | built_to         | 1999     |
  | generation       | 1        |
  | internal_code    | F99      |
  | total_production | 222222   |
